Package com.islandpower.configurator.service

Class LocationService

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.service.LocationService
@Service public class LocationService extends Object
Service class for fetching and processing location-based data. This class interacts with various external PVGIS APIs to obtain solar panel data, optimal values, and weather information.

  • Method Details

    • calculatePVGISData

      public List<LocationService.MonthlyHI_d> calculatePVGISData(String latitude, String longitude, String angle, String aspect)
      Fetches and processes photovoltaic (PV) data from the PVGIS API. The data includes monthly solar irradiance values.
      Parameters:
      latitude - The latitude of the location.
      longitude - The longitude of the location.
      angle - The angle of the solar panels.
      aspect - The aspect (orientation) of the solar panels.
      Returns:
      List of MonthlyHI_d objects containing monthly solar irradiance data.

    • fetchOptimalValues

      public LocationService.OptimalValues fetchOptimalValues(String latitude, String longitude)
      Fetches optimal values for solar panel angles and aspects from the PVGIS API.
      Parameters:
      latitude - The latitude of the location.
      longitude - The longitude of the location.
      Returns:
      OptimalValues object containing the optimal angle and aspect for solar panels.

    • getMinMaxTemperatures

      public double[] getMinMaxTemperatures(String latitude, String longitude)
      Fetches minimum and maximum temperatures from the weather data API.
      Parameters:
      latitude - The latitude of the location.
      longitude - The longitude of the location.
      Returns:
      Array containing minimum and maximum temperatures.
